actions.text: On agreeing to the Harder (CA) amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 174 (Roll no. 211).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Harder (CA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Harder (CA) amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 174 (Roll no. 211).
Roll call votes on amendments in House

description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 116-61 to provide opioid specific education and training to the Navigators and the Certified Application Counselors (CACs) that ensures they can best educate individuals on the marketplace plans specifically for opioid health care treatment.
purpose: Amendment provides opioid specific education and training to the Navigators and the Certified Application Counselors (CACs) that ensures they can best educate individuals on the marketplace plans specifically for opioid health care treatment.
